  • Uses of RetryTransaction in org.dellroad.stuff.spring

    Constructors in org.dellroad.stuff.spring with parameters of type RetryTransaction
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    RetrySetup(String transactionManagerName, String description, Supplier<T> transaction, RetryTransaction annotation)
    Constructor that uses the values from a @RetryTransaction annotation, if not null, for maximum retries, initial delay, and maximum delay, otherwise falling back to the aspect defaults.
